title: gradle listExtensions / addExtension fails
body:
### Describe the bug

Trying to list or add an extension with gradle fails with

`> Task :listExtensions FAILED
Failed to resolve platform io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-bom-quarkus-platform-descriptor:2.5.4.Final:json:2.5.4.Final using the following registries: registry.quarkus.io`

### Expected behavior

list extensions or add extensions

### Actual behavior

fails with error

`
> Task :listExtensions FAILEDG [815ms]
Failed to resolve platform io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-bom-quarkus-platform-descriptor:2.5.4.Final:json:2.5.4.Final using the following registries: registry.quarkus.io

FAILURE: Build failed with an exception.

* What went wrong:
Execution failed for task ':listExtensions'.
> Unable to list extensions
`

### How to Reproduce?

- create a random project at https://code.quarkus.io/ with gradle as build tool
- download and unzip
- run gradlew listExtensions



### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Windows 10

### Output of `java -version`

11.0.13 (Oracle Corporation 11.0.13+8)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.5.4.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Gradle 7.3

### Additional information

_No response_
